HEART

Health Equity Advocacy Response Team

HEART is a student-led organization dedicated to advancing health equity by addressing systemic, social, and economic barriers to health.

Join HEART Learn More

Our Mission

To advocate, educate, and take action in response to health inequities by empowering communities, supporting evidence-based initiatives, and promoting inclusive healthcare systems.

What We Do

Advocacy

We raise awareness about health disparities and advocate for equitable health policies that support underserved communities.

Community Engagement

We collaborate with local organizations through volunteering, outreach initiatives, and community partnerships.

Education

We deliver accessible, evidence-based health education and work to combat misinformation through clear communication.

Get Involved

HEART welcomes students from all disciplines who are passionate about health equity, social justice, and community service.
